title: E. Jean Carroll seeks to amend other Trump lawsuit for his comment on battery verdict
description: E. Jean Carroll is seeking to amend a defamation lawsuit against Trump to account for statements he made after a jury found him liable for battery and defamation

title: Lawsuit: New York City hospital covered up abuse by star doctor convicted of rape
description: A major New York City hospital is facing allegations that hospital officials ignored a star physician’s rampant sexual abuse of patients for more than a decade

title: Georgia school's book bans may break civil rights law, federal officials warn
description: The U.S. Department of Education says a Georgia school district’s decision to remove some books may have created a hostile environment that violated federal laws against race and sex discrimination

title: TikTok sues Montana over state's ban of app
description: "We are challenging Montana's unconstitutional TikTok ban," the company said.

title: Rick Hoyt, Boston Marathon fixture with father pushing wheelchair, has died at 61
description: Boston Marathon fixture Rick Hoyt has died at the age of 61

title: Democrats target swing seat House Republicans over Trump's 'defund' FBI remark
description: House Democrats are launching a billboard campaign this week focusing on swing seat Republicans over Trump's post to "defund the [Justice Department] and FBI"

title: Ray Stevenson, star of 'RRR' and 'Star Wars: Ahsoka,' dies at 58
description: Actor Ray Stevenson of "RRR," the "Divergent" films and the upcoming "Star Wars: Ahsoka," has died.

title: New search for Madeleine McCann, UK toddler missing since 2007, Portuguese police confirm
description: Portuguese police say they'll resume searching for Madeleine McCann, the British toddler who disappeared in the Algarve region in 2007, in the next few days

title: Nebraska governor signs 12-week abortion ban, gender-affirming care limits for minors
description: Nebraska’s Republican governor has signed a bill that bans abortion at 12 weeks and restricts gender-affirming medical care for people younger than 19

title: Supreme Court won't hear dispute over California law barring sale of foie gras
description: The Supreme Court says it won’t get involved in a dispute over a California animal cruelty law that bars foie gras from being sold in the state

title: Biden, McCarthy to talk debt ceiling, spending as time runs short to avoid default
description: President Joe Biden and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy will meet Monday afternoon with just 10 days to reach a debt ceiling deal or risk an unprecedented default.

title: Carmelo Anthony retires from NBA after 19-year career
description: Carmelo Anthony, the star forward who led Syracuse to an NCAA championship in his lone college season and went on to spend 19 years in the NBA, announced his retirement on Monday

title: What the landmark Colorado River deal will require of states
description: The Biden administration has reached a landmark deal with states dependent on the Colorado River to conserve water amid the decadeslong drought.

title: ABC News exclusive: FAA giving airports more than $100M to prevent runway incursions
description: More than $100 million will go to airports across the country to reduce potential runway incursions, the FAA said Monday

title: Sharks bite two fishermen in Florida Keys in separate incidents
description: Two fishermen have been bitten by sharks in separate incidents less than 36 hours apart in the Florida Keys

title: Detroit mother charged with murder in the 2022 drug-related death of her 4-year-old son
description: A 40-year-old Detroit mother has been charged with felony murder and child abuse in the drug-related death of her 4-year-old son

title: Tim Scott set to join the 2024 Republican race for president
description: South Carolina Sen. Tim Scott on Monday was set to announce that he's seeking the Republican nomination for president in 2024

title: Space station welcomes 2 Saudi visitors, including kingdom's 1st female astronaut
description: A private flight carrying two Saudi astronauts and other visitors has arrived at the International Space Station

title: 8 women join suit over Texas' abortion bans, claim their lives were put in danger
description: Eight women have joined a lawsuit by the Center for Reproductive Rights against the state of Texas over its abortion bans, claiming their lives were put in danger.

title: TikTok, other social media trends thrusting performance crimes into US spotlight
description: A sharp uptick in thefts of Hyundais and Kias over the past two years has been linked to viral videos posted to TikTok and other social media platforms that teach people how to exploit a security vulnerability to steal the cars

title: Search ongoing for boy, 4, after sister, 8, dies in river closed after storms
description: Rescuers who recovered the body of an 8-year-old girl Sunday were searching for her 4-year-old brother after the siblings were carried away by the current of a California river that was off limits because of high water levels

title: India scorched by extreme heat with monsoon rains delayed
description: Swathes of India are bracing for more scorching heat, with New Delhi under a severe weather alert, as extreme temperatures strike parts of the country

title: WATCH:  Watch a Lego Ferrari go from zero to hero
description: A full-scale Ferrari Monza SP1 built of Lego bricks is on display at Legoland in Denmark.

title: Idaho college murder suspect Bryan Kohberger expected to be arraigned
description: Bryan Kohberger, the suspect accused of killing four Idaho college students, is expected on Monday to appear in for an arraignment.

title: WATCH:  Golf pro steals the show with hole-in-one at PGA Championship
description: Michael Block, a 46-year-old golf pro, dunked a hole-in-one on the final round and is guaranteed to play the PGA Championship next year.

title: Greece's center-right in landslide election victory
description: Despite inflicting the most crushing defeat in half a century on the opposition, Greece’s center-right Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis is expected to seek a second election within weeks, as he lacks the majority in Parliament to govern alone

title: Meta fined $1.3 billion for violating European data privacy rules
description: Facebook’s parent company, Meta, was fined $1.3 billion for failing to comply with the European Union’s privacy policies.

title: Ukraine top agenda on French President Macron's historic visit to Mongolia
description: Access to rare earth minerals and Russia's war against Ukraine topped the agenda on French President Emmanuel Macron’s historic visit to Mongolia

title: Inmate tunnels through wall, stabs man in neighboring cell
description: Kavian Thomas, an inmate at Rice Street jail in Fulton County, Georgia, allegedly dug a hole in a shower wall.

title: Singapore's prime minister tests positive for COVID-19
description: Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong has tested positive for COVID-19 for the first time after returning home from work trips in Africa and Asia

title: Tim Scott set to announce launch of his 2024 GOP presidential campaign
description: Sen. Tim Scott of South Carolina is set to announce his bid for president

title: Warner CEO booed as supporters of writers' strike picket
description: Scores of Boston University students turned their backs on the head of one of Hollywood’s biggest studios as he gave the school’s commencement address in a stadium where protesters supporting the Hollywood writers’ strike picketed outside

title: Rain, even smoke help fight wildfires in Alberta; new blaze brings evacuation in British Columbia
description: Rain, even smoke help fight wildfires in Alberta, officials say.

title: WATCH:  Bear cub spotted taking out the trash
description: Security camera footage captured a curious cub attempting to rifle through a bear-proof trash bin. It appeared the bin won, this time.

title: Griner gets warm welcome in first home game since being detained in Russian prison
description: Brittney Griner shined in first regular-season home game since being detained for nearly 10 months in a Russian prison
